Public Member Functions

 DelegationProviderListener (AbstractDelegationProvider *provider, ProviderListener *child_listener)
virtual void OnExecuting ()
virtual ~DelegationProviderListener ()

Detailed Description

For internal use in derived classes of DelegationProvider to handle a accurate progress indication. Delegates only OnExecuting to the child-listener. OnStarted and OnFinished on the child-listener should be invoked directly by the DelegationProvider.

Member Function Documentation

void DelegationProviderListener::OnExecuting (   )  [virtual]
 

Will be called during execution. Calls OnExecutingListener to modify the progress value before the OnExecuting method of the child-listener is invoked.

Reimplemented from ProviderListener.
